titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, August 25, 1948 (Duplicate; see also Tape 3)

mods.tableOfContents: Ponca War Dances. Shawnee Stomp, 1948. Foster Hood, first song. John Gibson, Jr., second song.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
